EmailTemplate.name: FY20_Cold_Nurture.FY20_Cold_Nurture_Email_4_SkyBet
EmailTemplate.subject: How Sky Betting & Gaming Outperformed the Market
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With their business scaling at high percentages year-over-year, Sky Betting & Gaming could no longer survive on their current system of management. Once they implemented Turbonomic in their environment, they were able to handle an increased number of complex workload transactions while more efficiently using their infrastructure.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/customer-videos/turbonomic-customer-case-study-skybet]]>
"If we're slow our customers will simply go elsewhere. With Turbonomic in place, we are confident that our products will perform well." - Lee O'Donnell, Director of IT Infrastructure & Security at Sky Betting & Gaming
Check out our Resource Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/]]> to learn more about how workload automation can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time. Regards, Elizabeth
